name: The Last DeadEnd
description: The Last DeadEnd is a game with elements of an adventure, shooter and horror. There is a mysterious atmosphere of a real old city, where the protagonist seeks answers to his questions and fights against the forces of evil.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 or AMD FX-8300; Intel 4000 or greater. Laptop versions of these chipsets may not be supported. Updates to your video and sound card drivers may be required. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 11 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 11 GB available space
